2020 MBBS FEE STRUCTURE IN INDIA AND ABROAD

MBBS is one of the most popular career paths as MBBS course is an immensely valued degree or course across the globe. MBBS from Abroad is economical as compare to India and it is totally worth to study MBBS in abroad with top MCI approved medical universities or colleges with affordable fee structure and without any donation for MBBS admission in different countries.

MBBS in abroad is a great option for every medical student, especially for Indians. There are around 10,000 Indian students who get admission to MBBS abroad every year. The number of Indian students keeps increasing to study MBBS abroad as the quality of education is extremely high.

{/* */}

Why Study MBBS in Abroad?

In India, there is a lot of competition for MBBS. Studying MBBS offers a golden opportunity for these students to attain their aim. The following reasons stimulate students to get admission in MBBS abroad:

Advantages of studying MBBS in Abroad

  1. MBBS abroad at a reasonable fee: The students who wish to study MBBS in abroad can get the best quality education at a reasonable fee of 15-25 Lakhs INR.
  2. No requirement for donation or capitation fee: Indian universities/colleges take a huge amount of donation or capitation fees excluding the yearly tuition fee. But this is not the case in the top medical universities/colleges abroad.
  3. No need for entrance test to get admission: For studying MBBS in Abroad, the students need to get a minimum of 50% in their 12th with Physics, Chemistry, and Biology. They donâ€™t even require clearing an entrance examination like IELTS & TOEFL.
  4. Best world-class infrastructure: Medical universities abroad provide world-class Infrastructure with all the latest equipment.
  5. No language problem: Medical universities abroad use the English language as the medium of education. It is not compulsory for students to learn the local language of the country to study MBBS in that country.
  6. Availability of hostel: Every medical colleges in abroad offer comfortable hostel accommodation to all its students and they also provide offer Indian food.
